00105          return &r==m_owner;

00121          return *m_owner;

00123 
00134        bool active() const {
00135          return owned() && !no_client();
00136        }
00147        bool no_client() const {
00148          return m_clients.empty();
00149        }
00158        size_type size() const {
00159          return m_clients.size();
00160        }

00168          return Relation(this, m_clients.begin());
00169        }
00176        Relation end() {
00177          return Relation(this, m_clients.end());
00178        }
